title: Metaverse Platform Sandbox Transferred Out 60M SAND Ahead of Monday's $133M Token Unlock
description: As the price of SAND slid 4% in August, the Sandbox Genesis smart contract had already emitted 60 million SAND tokens prior to the upcoming token unlocked scheduled for Aug. 14.

title: The Godfather of Generative Art Goes Global
description: Pioneering generative artist Casey Reas will release "923 Empty Rooms" with Bright Moments and Art Blocks at live events spanning six cities.

title: Alameda Hits a Snag in Lawsuit Over $9 Billion Locked in Grayscale Bitcoin Trust
description: The FTX affiliate first sued Grayscale in March. Now it says it needs more time to find a co-plaintiff.

title: DCG labels Gemini lawsuit as ‘character assassination’ in motion to dismiss
description:
Digital Currency Group (DCG) filed motions to dismiss the lawsuit brought against it by crypto exchange Gemini, according to an Aug. 10 court filing. DCG described the Gemini lawsuit as a continuation of the exchange’s public relations “character assassination” campaign started by its co-founders, Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss. Accuses Gemini of deflecting According to DCG, […]

The post DCG labels Gemini lawsuit as ‘character assassination’ in motion to dismiss appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bittrex slapped with jaw-dropping $24M fine by SEC
description: The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has recently revealed an agreement reached with the prominent cryptocurrency trading platform Bittrex, as well as its co-founder and former CEO, William Shihara. This agreement comes as a response to allegations of operating an unregistered exchange, a violation of federal regulations. The SEC, in an official announcement ... Read more

title: Cardano Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is ADA a good investment?
description: Cardano Price Predictions 2023-2032 Yet again, the crypto market is toiling in the abyss of uncertainty following the series of delisting fuelled by the ongoing United States SEC crackdown on major crypto platforms. Basically, it’s crypto winter in the summer as it stands. How do Cardano Price Prediction analysts steer in this turbulent crypto weather? ... Read more

title: Over $160,000,000 in Ethereum and Other Crypto Assets Moved to Coinbase’s Layer-2 Solution Hours After Launch
description:
Hundreds of millions of dollars worth of Ethereum (ETH) and other crypto assets have been moved to Coinbase’s new layer-2 scaling solution Base just hours after its launch. New data from Dune Analytics reveals that about $163 million has been moved to the bridge, which is powered by the blockchain-scaling solution Optimism (OP) since it […]

The post Over $160,000,000 in Ethereum and Other Crypto Assets Moved to Coinbase’s Layer-2 Solution Hours After Launch appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
